___eTag.description: eTag of the resource. To handle concurrent update scenario, this field will be used to determine whether the user is updating the latest version or not.

$eref.description: The properties of the budget.

___amount.description: The total amount of cost to track with the budget

___timeGrain.description: The time covered by a budget. Tracking of the amount will be reset based on the time grain.

___category.description: The category of the budget, whether the budget tracks cost or usage.

___filters.description: May be used to filter budgets by resource group, resource, or meter.

___notifications.description: Dictionary of notifications associated with the budget. Budget can have up to five notifications.

___timePeriod.description: The start and end date for a budget.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___threshold.description: Threshold value associated with a notification. Notification is sent when the cost exceeded the threshold. It is always percent and has to be between 0 and 1000.
